S:log-item.D:comment:
DERBY-4245 (partial): Sorting a table containing a CLOB fails after upgrade to 10.5. Fixes the NPE bug for both clean 10.5 databases and upgraded databases. Note that there is a remaining bug for upgraded databases that will be fixed with a subsequent patch under this issue.
Patch file: derby-4245-2a-sqlclob_fix.diff
